import * as cdk from 'aws-cdk-lib';
import * as lambda from 'aws-cdk-lib/aws-lambda';
import * as iam from 'aws-cdk-lib/aws-iam';
import * as s3 from 'aws-cdk-lib/aws-s3';
import * as sns from 'aws-cdk-lib/aws-sns';
import * as events from 'aws-cdk-lib/aws-events';
import * as eventsTargets from 'aws-cdk-lib/aws-events-targets';
import * as logs from 'aws-cdk-lib/aws-logs';
import { Construct } from 'constructs';

export class DevopsAgentStack extends cdk.Stack {
  constructor(scope: Construct, id: string, props?: cdk.StackProps) {
    super(scope, id, props);

    // 1. S3 Bucket for incident context
    const incidentBucket = new s3.Bucket(this, 'IncidentContextBucket', {
      versioned: true,
      encryption: s3.BucketEncryption.S3_MANAGED,
    });

    // 2. SNS Topic for human alerts
    const alertTopic = new sns.Topic(this, 'DevopsAlertTopic');

    // 3. IAM Role for Lambda
    const lambdaRole = new iam.Role(this, 'IncidentLambdaRole', {
      assumedBy: new iam.ServicePrincipal('lambda.amazonaws.com'),
      managedPolicies: [
        iam.ManagedPolicy.fromAwsManagedPolicyName('service-role/AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole'),
        iam.ManagedPolicy.fromAwsManagedPolicyName('AmazonSSMFullAccess'),
        iam.ManagedPolicy.fromAwsManagedPolicyName('CloudWatchLogsReadOnlyAccess'),
        iam.ManagedPolicy.fromAwsManagedPolicyName('AmazonS3FullAccess'),
        iam.ManagedPolicy.fromAwsManagedPolicyName('AmazonSNSFullAccess'),
      ],
    });

    // Grant Bedrock permissions (minimal)
    lambdaRole.addToPolicy(new iam.PolicyStatement({
      actions: ['bedrock:InvokeModel', 'bedrock:InvokeAgent'],
      resources: ['*'], // restrict in prod
    }));

    // 4. Lambda: Incident Handler
    const incidentHandler = new lambda.Function(this, 'IncidentHandler', {
      runtime: lambda.Runtime.PYTHON_3_12,
      handler: 'incident_handler.lambda_handler',
      code: lambda.Code.fromAsset('lambda'),
      role: lambdaRole,
      environment: {
        INCIDENT_BUCKET: incidentBucket.bucketName,
        ALERT_TOPIC_ARN: alertTopic.topicArn,
        BEDROCK_AGENT_ID: 'YOUR_AGENT_ID', // ‚Üê Replace after agent creation
      },
      timeout: cdk.Duration.minutes(5),
    });

    // 5. CloudWatch Event Rule (example: high CPU)
    const cpuAlarmRule = new events.Rule(this, 'HighCpuAlarmRule', {
      eventPattern: {
        source: ['aws.cloudwatch'],
        detailType: ['CloudWatch Alarm State Change'],
        detail: {
          state: { 'value': ['ALARM'] },
          alarmName: [{ prefix: 'HighCPU-' }],
        },
      },
    });
    cpuAlarmRule.addTarget(new eventsTargets.LambdaFunction(incidentHandler));

    // 6. Outputs
    new cdk.CfnOutput(this, 'IncidentBucketName', { value: incidentBucket.bucketName });
    new cdk.CfnOutput(this, 'AlertTopicArn', { value: alertTopic.topicArn });
    new cdk.CfnOutput(this, 'IncidentHandlerArn', { value: incidentHandler.functionArn });
  }
}
